Dear Kofi Kwame,

I've been working with our Finance and Costs department, and we've come up with several figures for your consideration:

The cost of processing the cloth, cutting, assembling and shipping of 1 MILLION T-shirts in sizes Small, Medium, Large, & X-Large, (250,000 of EACH size) is as follows:

Sm: $3.17 per shirt = $792,500

Med: $3.37 / shirt = $742,500

Lg: $3.57 / shirt = $952,500

X-L: $3.77 / shirt = $842,500

Grand total = $3,470,000 (Total amount includes labor, overtime labor, materials, Shipping&Handling, warehouse handling, taxes and tariffs.

Total. Absolute lowest price we can do for a million shirts.

I want you to be assured that we manufacture only the finest quality products, you and your department will be very impressed with the garments.

Dilbert H. Dowe, President, CEO, UnderDowes, INC (OK, dhd)
